sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser">
    <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <activation_example>!weather london</activation_example>
        <active>true</active>
        <description>Weather Report Generator</description>
        <emoji/>
        <flags>gmi</flags>
        <order/>
        <regex>!weather</regex>
        <script><![CDATA[/**	
 * activation_example: !weather london
 * !weather should end  with location 
 **/
var wordCount = current.text.replace('!weather', '').trim().split(' ');

if (wordCount[0] != '') {

    var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
    rm.setLogLevel('all');
    rm.setEndpoint('https://wttr.in/' + wordCount[0] + '?format=4');
    var response = rm.execute();
    new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, response.getBody());
} else {
    new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, 'Please Provide Location Ex: "!weather london"');
}
// ]]></script>
        <stop_processing>false</stop_processing>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-10 16:56:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>07ecb7c44766d1106eaffa37536d4356</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-10 19:43:34</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_slackerbot_parser>
</record_update>
